title: Japan
subtle:
Informational (nonfiction), 1,053 words, Level T (Grade 3), Lexile 910L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     K and Z
description: Japan exolores many interesting facts about this island country. From the ancient history of shoguns to culture in the modern capital city, this book details many of the aspects of Japanese history, geography, and people that make the country such a wonderful place.
highFrequencyWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
